definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy, teaching, education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面貫徹執行黨的教育方針，教書育人，五育並舉。

sentences.english: The teaching staff shoulders the responsibility of teaching and educating students.
sentences.chinese: 教職工肩負着教書育人的責任。

sentences.english: Ideology and politics theory are the essential of education.
sentences.chinese: 思想品德和政治理論教育是育人根本。

sentences.english: The schooling essence is not only teaching knowledge but also educating people.
sentences.chinese: 學校教育的本質是既教書又育人。

sentences.english: Education through service is an important phrat of school work.
sentences.chinese: 服務育人是學校教育的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: To built good educate environment and provide fully development space for students .
sentences.chinese: 建設良好的育人環境，爲學生提供全面發展的空間。

sentences.english: Some schools teach, but fail to educate their students.
sentences.chinese: 有些學校只教給學生知識，卻忽略了育人。

sentences.english: The fundamental mission of highly-qualified and skill-based education is "educating people".
sentences.chinese: 高素質技能型教育的根本使命是“育人”。

sentences.english: Compus culture construction is an important link in fostering students in new times.
sentences.chinese: 校園文化建設是新時期高校育人工作的重要環節。

sentences.english: Cultivation education is an important way of educating people in colleges.
sentences.chinese: 養成教育是高校育人的重要途徑。

sentences.english: Secondly, schools should carry out plans of education for students' all round development with equal attention of teaching and cultivating.
sentences.chinese: 學校要大力推行素質教育和養成教育，做到教書育人。

sentences.english: Is in a flash, nurtures the person 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 彈指一揮間，育人三十年。

sentences.english: The logistics departments of colleges should take the responsibility of "educating people through service".
sentences.chinese: 高校後勤部門必須擔負“服務育人”這一重任。

sentences.english: Around the thought, the reason is the so-called teaching.
sentences.chinese: 繞有所思，那些大道理是所謂教書育人的架子。

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy， teaching， education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面貫徹執行黨的教育方針，教書育人，五育並舉。

sentences.english: The basic meaning of Wei Shesheng's view about rearing.
sentences.chinese: 魏書生育人觀的基本內涵。

definition: It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom)/fig. a good education program takes a long time to develop/cf. 十年樹木，百年樹人|十年树木，百年树人
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.
pinyin: shi2 nian2 shu4 mu4 , bai3 nian2 shu4 ren2

definition: when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
education for everyone, irrespective of background
to serve as a model for others (idiom)/to be a worthy teacher
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
instructing with tireless zeal (idiom, from Analects)
(idiom) to teach in line with the student's ability
